DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Computer-assisted stop-smoking plan telephone counseling may help people stop smoking . It yet know computer-based smoking cessation program effective without telephone counsel help smoker quit smoke . PURPOSE : This randomized clinical trial study two different computer-based smoking cessation program compare well work without telephone counsel help smoker quit smoking .
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare efficacy premium internet intervention v premium internet telephone intervention v basic internet intervention , determine 7-day point prevalence abstinence 12 month , adult smoker . - Compare cost-effectiveness intervention promote smoke cessation . - Determine effect internet-based intervention measure use intervention ( frequency duration use , utilization behavioral coping , expert advice , e-mail ) patient . - Determine effect internet-based intervention variable important behavior change include mediator ( e.g. , self-efficacy , use internet social support ) moderator ( e.g. , gender , baseline motivation ) outcomes patient . OUTLINE : This randomize , control , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord gender baseline motivation level . Patients randomize 1 3 intervention arm . - Arm I ( basic internet program ) : Patients direct website exist QuitNet™ smoke cessation material . These material tailor interactive feature . - Arm II ( premium internet program ) : Patients receive free 6-month access QuitNet™ website include interactive individualize intervention feature . - Arm III ( premium internet program plus telephone counseling ) : Patients receive free access QuitNet™ website arm II . Patients also receive 5 telephone counseling session , schedule convenience . All patient assess baseline 3 , 6 , 12 , 18 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 2,205 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Smokes least 5 cigarette day No prior use QuitNet website Must access internet telephone home work PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
